Detailed Description

DzElementData implementation that stores the IK chain information of an imported Poser figure.

This data class is attached to the DzSkeleton node of an imported Poser figure. It contains a list of DzLegacyIKChain objects. Each of those chain objects represents a single "inkyChain" section in the Poser CR2 file from which the figure was loaded.

See also:
DzLegacyIKChain
